message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair, right?
I think it's fair to take a bit more since I'm losing less value per round.  Let's split it 60/40.  What do you say?
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. Let's split it 55/45.  This way we both get a good chunk and we can avoid the risk of getting nothing at all!
I'm willing to go up to 65/35, but I don't think we have much time left.  We both need to get something here!
Bob, we're running out of time. Let's meet in the middle and split it 45/55.  We both get a decent amount, and we don't risk getting nothing at all. What do you say?
